main.name: Abbas Ali
main.description: I am pursuing a Professional master's degree from the Univerity of Maryland, College Park. My courses include Hacking in C, Network and Protocol, Algorithms, and Data Structures
main.bio: I love understanding people’s problems and finding ways to solve them. I care deeply about the people I work with and bring empathy, strong communication and homely environment to teams. I like to challenge myself and strive to learn and teach as much as I can.

resume.skillmessage: I have worked on legacy codes as well as created projects from scratch so I understand the importance of version control, proper commenting and indentation. I am passionate about programming and I have a keen interest in cybersecurity, blockchain, algorithms, data structures and networking.

education.description: Hacking in C | TCP/IP Networking | Network Protocols | Secure Operating Systems | Security Tools | Data  Structures

Object Oriented Programming using Java | Analysis and Design of Algorithm | Computer Architecture | Operating systems | Database Management systems | Computer Networks | Distributed Systems | Web Security

work.title: BookSeller
work.description: I learned how to politely communicate with people and make them comfortable. Working at bookstore helped me understand that if I put everything into whatever is assigned to me, I can create a difference and anykind of work that is assigned ia important.

work.title: Solution Engineer
work.description: I started working as a C++ developer and undertook a Geo-tracking module, which took month to çompletion and integration. I was then asked to learn React-Native in which I worked on a number of applications as well as modules including a module for video calling, chatting integrated with firebase, payment integration and template screen. I also learned iOS and android development during this this. I was then assigned the task to research on blockchains like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero, etc

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

testimonials.text: I enjoyed working with Abbas as he is a very hard working and a detail oriented person and has exceptional expertise in leadership and motivation. He is not only reliable and forward-thinking, but provides out of the box solutions. His enthusiasm and dedication are inspiring making him a great asset and a valuable resource. I would choose to work with him again given the opportunity, and I highly recommend him without any hesitation.

Abbas is a capable, hard-working personality. Always ready to adopt new working environments and technologies. He is dedicated, self-motivated and independent person and has a positive attitude toward work and colleagues.
